source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT TOP (300)
    ref_id,
    SAP_PO_NUM,
    SCM_Q_PO_NO,
    SCM_OPERATION_NO,
    SCM_ORD_QTY_KG,
    SCM_ORD_QTY_PCS,
    SAP_BATCH_ID,
    BATCH_QTY,  
    BATCH_PCS,
    PRODN_MACHINE,
CONVERT(varchar, CAST(START_TIME AS datetime), 101) + ' ' + CONVERT(varchar, CAST(START_TIME AS datetime), 108) AS START_TIME,
    CONVERT(varchar, CAST(END_TIME AS datetime), 101) + ' ' + CONVERT(varchar, CAST(END_TIME AS datetime), 108) AS END_TIME,  
       CONVERT(varchar, CAST(PRODN_REC_DATE AS datetime), 101) + ' ' + CONVERT(varchar, CAST(PRODN_REC_DATE AS datetime), 108) + ' ' + RIGHT(CONVERT(varchar, CAST(PRODN_REC_DATE AS datetime), 100), 2) AS PRODN_REC_DATE,
    CONVERT(varchar, CAST(CREATE_DATE AS datetime), 101) + ' ' + CONVERT(varchar, CAST(CREATE_DATE AS datetime), 108) + ' ' + RIGHT(CONVERT(varchar, CAST(CREATE_DATE AS datetime), 100), 2) AS CREATE_DATE,
    CONVERT(varchar, ISNULL(CAST(MODIFY_DATE AS datetime), GETDATE()), 101) + ' ' + CONVERT(varchar, ISNULL(CAST(MODIFY_DATE AS datetime), GETDATE()), 108) + ' ' + RIGHT(CONVERT(varchar, ISNULL(CAST(MODIFY_DATE AS datetime), GETDATE()), 100), 2) AS MODIFY_DATE,
    PRODN_ORDER_NO_SCH,
    PRODN_STATUS,
    NR_OF_OPERATION,
    product_type,
    SAP_BATCH_ID AS SAP_BATCH_ID_TAG_NO,
    CONVERT(varchar, CAST(CREATE_DATE AS datetime), 101) + ' ' + CONVERT(varchar, CAST(CREATE_DATE AS datetime), 108) + ' ' + RIGHT(CONVERT(varchar, CAST(CREATE_DATE AS datetime), 100), 2) AS CREATE_DATE__STS_START_CRDATE
FROM
    STS.dbo.tbl_sts_scm_prodn_staging_upd_test
WHERE
    REC_TYPE = 'A'  
    AND (SAP_BATCH_ID LIKE 'O%'
         OR SAP_BATCH_ID LIKE 'F%'
         OR SAP_BATCH_ID LIKE 'M%'    
         OR SAP_BATCH_ID LIKE 'P%'
         OR (SAP_BATCH_ID LIKE 'A%' AND PRODN_STATUS <> 'G'));

SELECT TOP (300)
    ref_id,
    SAP_PO_NUM,
    SCM_Q_PO_NO,
    SCM_OPERATION_NO,
    SCM_ORD_QTY_KG,
    SCM_ORD_QTY_PCS,
    SAP_BATCH_ID,
    BATCH_QTY,  
    BATCH_PCS,
    PRODN_MACHINE,
CONVERT(varchar, CAST(START_TIME AS datetime), 101) + ' ' + CONVERT(varchar, CAST(START_TIME AS datetime), 108) AS START_TIME,
    CONVERT(varchar, CAST(END_TIME AS datetime), 101) + ' ' + CONVERT(varchar, CAST(END_TIME AS datetime), 108) AS END_TIME,  
       CONVERT(varchar, CAST(PRODN_REC_DATE AS datetime), 101) + ' ' + CONVERT(varchar, CAST(PRODN_REC_DATE AS datetime), 108) + ' ' + RIGHT(CONVERT(varchar, CAST(PRODN_REC_DATE AS datetime), 100), 2) AS PRODN_REC_DATE,
    CONVERT(varchar, CAST(CREATE_DATE AS datetime), 101) + ' ' + CONVERT(varchar, CAST(CREATE_DATE AS datetime), 108) + ' ' + RIGHT(CONVERT(varchar, CAST(CREATE_DATE AS datetime), 100), 2) AS CREATE_DATE,
    CONVERT(varchar, ISNULL(CAST(MODIFY_DATE AS datetime), GETDATE()), 101) + ' ' + CONVERT(varchar, ISNULL(CAST(MODIFY_DATE AS datetime), GETDATE()), 108) + ' ' + RIGHT(CONVERT(varchar, ISNULL(CAST(MODIFY_DATE AS datetime), GETDATE()), 100), 2) AS MODIFY_DATE,
    PRODN_ORDER_NO_SCH,
    PRODN_STATUS,
    NR_OF_OPERATION,
    product_type,
    SAP_BATCH_ID AS SAP_BATCH_ID_TAG_NO,
    CONVERT(varchar, CAST(CREATE_DATE AS datetime), 101) + ' ' + CONVERT(varchar, CAST(CREATE_DATE AS datetime), 108) + ' ' + RIGHT(CONVERT(varchar, CAST(CREATE_DATE AS datetime), 100), 2) AS CREATE_DATE__STS_START_CRDATE
FROM
    STS.dbo.tbl_sts_scm_prodn_staging_upd_test
WHERE
    REC_TYPE = 'P'

scripts.text:
update dbo.tbl_sts_scm_prodn_staging_upd_test SET REC_TYPE = 'P' where 
    REC_TYPE = 'A'  
    AND (SAP_BATCH_ID LIKE 'O%'
         OR SAP_BATCH_ID LIKE 'F%'
         OR SAP_BATCH_ID LIKE 'M%'    
         OR SAP_BATCH_ID LIKE 'P%'
         OR (SAP_BATCH_ID LIKE 'A%' AND PRODN_STATUS <> 'G'));
